revised_title: Observations on the Production and Quality of Myrrh in Abyssinia
tldr: The author, James Bruce, explores the production and quality of myrrh in Abyssinia, comparing it to the myrrh of ancient times. He describes the process of obtaining myrrh, the different qualities based on the tree's age and health, and the various factors affecting the quality of the drug. Bruce also discusses the differences between the myrrh of the Troglodytes and that of Arabia, and the challenges in obtaining samples of the myrrh tree for further study.
